modName: Daenerys Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My own version of Daenarys from the tv series, be patient..is not perfect but she can control dragons..
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][center][color=#a4c2f4] DAENERYS FOLLOWER [/color]

[size=3]Daenerys is a [color=#6d9eeb]STANDALONE FOLLOWER[/color] which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.
[color=#93c47d][size=5]
26\12\2016 NEW VERSION 1.1 ONLINE [/size][/color]
[color=#6aa84f](Facelight by tktk ever raccomanded)
[/color][size=3][color=#3d85c6][color=#6aa84f][/color]
[Follower detail][/color]
[/size]
[color=#cfe2f3]Name[/color] : Daenerys
[color=#cfe2f3]Race[/color] : Nord
[color=#cfe2f3]Level[/color] : 30
[color=#cfe2f3]Voice[/color] : Young Eager
[color=#cfe2f3]Body[/color] : UNP
[color=#cfe2f3]Textures[/color]: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
[color=#cfe2f3]Weight[/color] : 50
[color=#cfe2f3]Default Armor[/color] : Imperial Investigator Armor UNP by Calyps
[color=#cfe2f3]Default Spell[/color] : Fire Ball
[color=#cfe2f3]Shouts[/color]: Disarm enemies and Call Dragon
[color=#cfe2f3]Location[/color] : Dragon's Reach - Whiterun
[color=#cfe2f3]Combat Style[/color] : Mage combat
[size=2][size=3]She is Merriable and unkillable
[/size]
[/size][size=4][color=#3c78d8][Special Thanks][/color]

[color=#6aa84f][b]Dracofish aka MelissaGT[/b]
Calyps
Kalilies
dimon99[/color]
Zzjay
